sql.name: getLoginTypeCountByCode
sql.memo: 根据登录方式编码统计登录方式信息条数

dataset.sql: SELECT count(1) AS count_code FROM meb_login_type WHERE code = ? AND isvalid = 1

sql.name: getMebInfo
sql.memo: 获取基本用户详细信息

dataset.sql: SELECT mi.uid,mip.tel,mip.nickname,mip.realname,mip.identity_number, mip.photo,mi.`status`,mip.sex,mi.createtime AS reg_time,mip.height, mip.body_type,mip.education,mip.drinking,mip.smoking,mip.pets,mip.email FROM meb_info mi LEFT JOIN meb_info_per mip ON mi.uid = mip.uid LEFT JOIN meb_log_reg reg ON reg.uid=mi.uid WHERE 1 = 1 $dynamicsql

sql.name: getMebListByLogin
sql.memo: 获取会员列表根据登录日志

dataset.sql: SELECT mi.uid,mip.tel,mip.nickname,mip.realname,mip.identity_number, mip.photo,mi.`status`,mip.sex,mi.createtime AS reg_time,mip.height, mip.body_type,mip.education,mip.drinking,mip.smoking,mip.pets,mip.email FROM meb_info mi LEFT JOIN meb_info_per mip ON mi.uid = mip.uid LEFT JOIN meb_log_login mll ON mll.uid = mi.uid WHERE 1 = 1 AND mi.`status` = 1 $dynamicsql ORDER BY mll.createtime DESC
